Title: Makes permanent certain provisions authorizing a school district to provide student transportation based upon patterns of actual ridership
Summary: Makes permanent certain provisions authorizing a school district to provide student transportation based upon patterns of actual ridership.
LawCode: Amd Part C subpart F ยง26, Chap 97 of 2011
ActClause: AN ACT to amend subpart F of part C of chapter 97 of the laws of 2011 amending the education law relating to census reporting, in relation to making permanent certain provisions authorizing a school district to provide student transportation based upon patterns of actual ridership
